Title: Ayan
Writer: A.N. Balakrishnan (dialogue), A.N. Balakrishnan (story and screenplay), Anand K.V. (story and screenplay), Rajshri Sudhakar (Dialogue Writer: Telugu), D. Suresh (dialogue), D. Suresh (story and screenplay)
Plot: A young man's smuggling lifestyle takes a serious turn, when a fierce rival tries to eliminate him from the business.
